channel.title: Rants and Raves on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rants and Raves on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: I Can’t Stop Playing Duolingo Chess
item.description: The language-learning app recently added a feature that teaches you how to play chess. I tried it, and now I’m hooked on those rooks, knights, and pawns.

item.title: I Can’t Stop Playing Duolingo Chess

item.title: Vivobarefoot's Sensus Shoes Are Like Gloves for Your Feet
item.description: Vivobarefoot’s barely there shoes are perfect for casual wear, workouts, trail running, and walking around town.
